import { Component, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; import { fuseAnimations } from '@fuse/animations'; @Component({ selector : 'confirmation-required-split-screen-reversed', templateUrl : './confirmation-required.component.html', encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None, animations : fuseAnimations }) export class ConfirmationRequiredSplitScreenReversedComponent { /** * Constructor */ constructor() { } }
